admiral-coburn-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
admiral-coburn-commander-old-legacy.name: Admiral Coburn
admiral-coburn-commander-old-legacy.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is attacking a ship, 1 other friendly ship at distance 1-5 of the defender may spend 1 defense token. If you do, it may add 1 red die to the attack pool.

admiral-nantz-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
admiral-nantz-commander-old-legacy.name: Admiral Nantz
admiral-nantz-commander-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly ship performs a :salvo: attack, it may add 1 die to its attack pool of a color already in its attack pool.

admiral-rogriss-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
admiral-rogriss-commander-old-legacy.name: Admiral Rogriss
admiral-rogriss-commander-old-legacy.ability:
After a friendly ship is deployed, if that ship does not have a :super-weapon: icon in its upgrade bar, it may perform a speed 1 maneuver.
At the start of the second round, assign each enemy ship a raid token of your choice.

general-madine-commander-errata-old-lega.author: Armada Legacy
general-madine-commander-errata-old-lega.name: General Madine
general-madine-commander-errata-old-lega.ability: When a friendly ship resolves a Icon Command Navigate command, if it spent a Icon Command Navigate dial it may increase 1 additional yaw value by 1. If it spent a Icon Command Navigate token, it may either change its speed or increase 1 yaw value by 1.

gilad-pellaeon-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
gilad-pellaeon-commander-old-legacy.name: Gilad  Pellaeon
gilad-pellaeon-commander-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may choose and cancel 1 attack die. If it does, a friendly ship at distance 1-5 of the attacker may gain a command token of any type.

han-solo-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
han-solo-commander-old-legacy.name: Han Solo
han-solo-commander-old-legacy.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is attacking, it may spend 1 icon from the attack pool to choose and exhaust 1 of the defender's defense tokens.

nute-gunray-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
nute-gunray-commander-old-legacy.name: Nute Gunray
nute-gunray-commander-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly ship is defending against a ship, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, if there is 1 or more friendly squadrons within both the attacking hull zonels firing arc and the defending hull zone's firing arc, you may force the attacker to reroll 1 die.

riff-tamson-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
riff-tamson-commander-old-legacy.name: Riff Tamson
riff-tamson-commander-old-legacy.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is defending against a ship, if the attacker has 1 or more damage cards, the defender may reduce the total damage by 1 toa minimum of 1 before suffering damage.

yoda-commander-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
yoda-commander-old-legacy.name: Yoda
yoda-commander-old-legacy.ability: Once per activation, while a friendly ship is defending against a ship at close range, it may spend 1 defense token to cancel 1 die instead of resolving that token's effect.

cloaking-device-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
cloaking-device-old-legacy.name: Cloaking Device
cloaking-device-old-legacy.ability:
Stealth only.
While defending, you may exhaust this card and spend a defense token to resolve the :scatter: defense effect instead of that tokens effect.
You cannot equip :fleet-command: cards to this ship.

flares-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
flares-old-legacy.name: Flares
flares-old-legacy.ability:
Small Ship only.
While defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may discard one command token from this card to cancel 1 black die of your choice.

cloaking-field-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
cloaking-field-old-legacy.name: Cloaking Field
cloaking-field-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly squadron without STRATEGIC is at distance 1-3 of you, it gains CLOAK.

grav-cone-projector-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
grav-cone-projector-old-legacy.name: Grav Cone Projector
grav-cone-projector-old-legacy.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may set aside 1 other friendly small or medium ship and place 1 round token on this card. At the start of the round matching that token, you may deploy that ship at distance 1-2 of you. That ship cannot be deployed overlapping squadrons and cannot be the first ship to activate that round.

reversed-grav-well-projector-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
reversed-grav-well-projector-old-legacy.name: Reversed Grav Well Projector
reversed-grav-well-projector-old-legacy.ability: When you deploy place 1 reversed grav token anywhere in the play area. At the start of the first ship phase, each non-huge ship at distance 1-3 of a reversed grav token must execute a speed-1 maneuver.

advanced-guidance-system-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
advanced-guidance-system-old-legacy.name: Advanced Guidance System
advanced-guidance-system-old-legacy.ability: :squadron:: While squadrons with BOMBER you activate are attacking a ship, :crit: icons in each squadrons attack pool cannot be rerolled by the :evade: defense effect.

drill-beak-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
drill-beak-old-legacy.name: Dril Beak
drill-beak-old-legacy.ability:
Modification.
When you overlap an enemy ship, the enemy ship suffers a faceup damage card and does not suffer a facedown damage card. When you overlap an enemy ship, you suffer 1 fewer damage card.

reserve-bulk-hangar-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
reserve-bulk-hangar-old-legacy.name: Reserve Bulk Hangar
reserve-bulk-hangar-old-legacy.ability:
Non-small ship only.
When a friendly, non-unique squadron with SWARM at distance 1-5 is destroyed, you may discard a token from this card. If you do, set that squadron's hull points to "2" and place that squadron, unengaged, at distance 1 with its activation slider toggled to the activated side.

tractor-tentacles-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
tractor-tentacles-old-legacy.name: Tractor Tentacles
tractor-tentacles-old-legacy.ability: Before an enemy small ship at distance 1-2 resolves the Determine Course step, you may exhaust this card to reduce its speed by 1 to a minimum of 0.

aayla-secura-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
aayla-secura-officer-old-legacy.name: Aayla Secura
aayla-secura-officer-old-legacy.ability: When you spend an :evade: token to resolve the standard effect, you may exhaust this card to affect 1 additional die.

admiral-yularen-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
admiral-yularen-officer-old-legacy.name: Admiral Yularen
admiral-yularen-officer-old-legacy.ability: When you reveal a command or at the start of the Status Phase, you may exhaust this card to gain an :repair: or :squadron: token.

borsk-feylya-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
borsk-feylya-officer-old-legacy.name: Borsk Fey'lya
borsk-feylya-officer-old-legacy.ability: After deploying fleets, place 2 non-consecutive round tokens on this card. At the start of each round matching 1 of those tokens, you may gain 2 command tokens of any type.

captain-onoma-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
captain-onoma-officer-old-legacy.name: Captain Onoma
captain-onoma-officer-old-legacy.ability: :confire:: You may reroll 1 additional die in your attack pool.

joruus-cbaoth-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
joruus-cbaoth-officer-old-legacy.name: Joruus C'baoth
joruus-cbaoth-officer-old-legacy.ability: When you gain a command token, you may choose up to 2 other friendly ships at distance 1-3. Each chosen ship may gain 1 matching command token.

k2-b4-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
k2-b4-officer-old-legacy.name: K2-B4
k2-b4-officer-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly squadron with AI at distance 1-3 is defending, it gains DODGE 1.

poggle-the-lesser-officer-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
poggle-the-lesser-officer-old-legacy.name: Poggle the Lesser
poggle-the-lesser-officer-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly squadron with GUARDIAN at distance 1-5 is attacking, it may reroll 1 die.

prince-admiral-krennel-officer-old-legac.author: Armada Legacy
prince-admiral-krennel-officer-old-legac.name: Prince Admiral Krennel
prince-admiral-krennel-officer-old-legac.ability: While attacking a ship, you may exhaust this card. If you do, while attacking a ship from your front hull zone this round, you may add red 1 die to the attack pool. If you do, until the end of the round, while you are defending, the attacker may reroll 1 die.

long-range-concussion-missiles-old-legac.author: Armada Legacy
long-range-concussion-missiles-old-legac.name: Long Range Concussion Missiles
long-range-concussion-missiles-old-legac.ability: While attacking a ship, you may exhaust this card. If you do, up to 2 of the black dice in your battery armament can be used at close-medium range during this attack. You cannot reroll black dice during this attack.

tracking-torpedoes-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
tracking-torpedoes-old-legacy.name: Tracking Torpedoes
tracking-torpedoes-old-legacy.ability:
While attacking a ship, your black :crit: icons cannot be rerolled by the :evade: defense effects.
While attacking, you may exhaust this card to change 1 blank black die to a side with a :crit: icon.

interception-protocols-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
interception-protocols-old-legacy.name: Interception Protocols
interception-protocols-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly squadron with AI:ANTI-SQUADRON at distance 1-5 is attacking an enemy squadron during its activation, if it moved during its activation, it may reroll 1 die.

rogue-protocols-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
rogue-protocols-old-legacy.name: Interception Protocols
rogue-protocols-old-legacy.ability: At the start of the squadron phase, if you have not resolved a :squadron: command this round, the first 4 friendly non- unique squadrons with AI at close-medium range that activate during the squadron phase gain ROGUE until the end of the round.

targeting-protocols-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
targeting-protocols-old-legacy.name: Targeting Protocols
targeting-protocols-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly squadron with AI: BATTERY at distance 1-5 is attacking a ship, it may change 1 die to a face with any 1 icon and no other icons.

clone-engineers-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
clone-engineers-old-legacy.name: Clone Engineers
clone-engineers-old-legacy.ability:
Clone only.
When you reveal a command, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 defense token to discard 1 damage card.

mon-calamari-shield-techs-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
mon-calamari-shield-techs-old-legacy.name: Mon Calamari Shield Techs
mon-calamari-shield-techs-old-legacy.ability:
"MC" only.
While defending, after you suffer damage, if the defending hull zone has no shields, you may discard this card to recover up to 2 shields in the defending hull zone.

repair-team-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
repair-team-old-legacy.name: Repair Team
repair-team-old-legacy.ability: Before you are dealt a faceup damage card with the SHIP trait, you may discard this card to discard that damage card.

katana-fleet-dreadnaught-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
katana-fleet-dreadnaught-old-legacy.name: Katana Fleet Dreadnaught
katana-fleet-dreadnaught-old-legacy.ability:
While this ship activates any number of squadrons, you may discard this card, if you do all squadrons activated by this ship with Bomber gain the following Critical Effect until the end of their activation:
:crit:: add 1 red die set to :accuracy:.
If a squadron activated by this ship does not have Bomber it instead gains Bomber until the end of it's activation.

abrogator-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
abrogator-title-old-legacy.name: Abrogator
abrogator-title-old-legacy.ability: Your :redirect: defense tokens cannot be targeted by :accuracy: results.

vendetta-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
vendetta-title-old-legacy.name: Vendetta
vendetta-title-old-legacy.ability: At the start of the first round, you may gain 1 :salvo: defense token.

binder-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
binder-title-old-legacy.name: Binder
binder-title-old-legacy.ability: During the Status Phase, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 enemy ship at distance 1-5. That ship cannot ready any of its exhausted non-:commander: upgrade cards. If you do, you cannot ready this card during the same status phase.

eternal-wrath-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
eternal-wrath-title-old-legacy.name: Binder
eternal-wrath-title-old-legacy.ability: When you exhaust an :experimental-retro: or :offensive-retro: upgrade card equipped to this ship, you may exhaust this card and a defense token to perform a SALVO attack against any enemy ship's hull zone you can draw line of sight to from one of your hull zones.

isolator-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
isolator-title-old-legacy.name: Binder
isolator-title-old-legacy.ability: After you execute a maneuver, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 asteroid or debris field obstacle within distance 1-3. If you do, you may move that obstacle within distance 2 of that obstacle's current location.

liberty-star-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
liberty-star-title-old-legacy.name: Liberty Star
liberty-star-title-old-legacy.ability: During your activation, while attacking a ship, if your speed is 3 or higher, you may add 1 black die to the attack pool.

tyrants-bane-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
tyrants-bane-title-old-legacy.name: Tyrant's Bane
tyrants-bane-title-old-legacy.ability: While attacking, you may exhaust this card. If you do, for each red :accuracy: icon spent from the attack pool, you may add 1 red die to the attack pool, up to 2 red dice.

allegiant-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
allegiant-title-old-legacy.name: Allegiant
allegiant-title-old-legacy.ability: Friendly squadrons at distance 1-3 with BOMBER and with no other keywords except HEAVY, gain SCREEN.

mon-remonda-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
mon-remonda-title-old-legacy.name: Mon Remonda
mon-remonda-title-old-legacy.ability: While defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may discard 1 command token from this card to reduce the total damage by 1.

remember-alderaan-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
remember-alderaan-title-old-legacy.name: Mon Remonda
remember-alderaan-title-old-legacy.ability: After defending against a ship, if the attacker rerolled dice or added dice to the attack pool, that ship gains 1 Raid Token of your opponentls choice.

stellar-rise-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
stellar-rise-title-old-legacy.name: Stellar Rise
stellar-rise-title-old-legacy.ability: Before you execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 defense token to increase 1 of your yaw values by 1 until the end of your activation.

surrogator-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
surrogator-title-old-legacy.name: Surrogator
surrogator-title-old-legacy.ability: During your activation, you may exhaust this card and choose 1 enemy ship at close range. If you do, that ship gains 1 raid token of your choice.

carrion-spike-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
carrion-spike-title-old-legacy.name: Carrion Spike
carrion-spike-title-old-legacy.ability: While attacking a ship, before the Gather Dice Step, you may treat up to 2 dice of your battery armament as dice of any color.

procurer-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
procurer-title-old-legacy.name: Procurer
procurer-title-old-legacy.ability: While deploying fleets, if you are in the play area, you may set aside up to 2 small or medium ships instead of deploying them. After deploying fleets, you may deploy those set aside ships in your deployment zone.

profusion-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
profusion-title-old-legacy.name: Profusion
profusion-title-old-legacy.ability: While attacking a ship, you may spend up to 2 shields from any of your hull zones to reroll 1 die for each shield spent.

vuuntun-palaa-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
vuuntun-palaa-title-old-legacy.name: Vuuntun Palaa
vuuntun-palaa-title-old-legacy.ability: :squadron:: Each friendly squadron with AI that you activate gains SWARM until the end of its activation. Each friendly squadron with AI and the printed SWARM keyword that you activate gains GRIT until the end of its activation.

grappler-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
grappler-title-old-legacy.name: Grappler
grappler-title-old-legacy.ability: After you overlap an enemy non-huge ship, you may discard this card to change its speed by 1 to a minimum of 1.

neimoidian-grasp-title-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
neimoidian-grasp-title-old-legacy.name: Neimoidian Grasp
neimoidian-grasp-title-old-legacy.ability: While you are defending against a ship at close range, before the Gather Dice step, you may exhaust this card to treat the attack as obstructed.

light-turbolaser-cannons-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
light-turbolaser-cannons-old-legacy.name: Light Turbolaser Cannons
light-turbolaser-cannons-old-legacy.ability: While performing a non-ignition attack against a ship at long range, when the defender resolves the :evade: defense effect, if a die would be canceled, it must be rerolled instead.

xv9-turbolasers-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
xv9-turbolasers-old-legacy.name: XV9 Turbolasers
xv9-turbolasers-old-legacy.ability: While performing a non-ignitionattack against a ship, you may add 1 blue die set to an :accuracy: icon to the attack pool. That icon cannot be spent to target defense tokens.

targeting-team-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
targeting-team-old-legacy.name: Targeting Team
targeting-team-old-legacy.ability: During your activation, while attacking a ship, you may reroll 1 attack die.

asajj-ventress-boarding-team-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
asajj-ventress-boarding-team-old-legacy.name: Asajj Ventress
asajj-ventress-boarding-team-old-legacy.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. If you do, you may choose and discard 1 of that ships defense tokens.

bx-commando-droids-boarding-team-old-leg.author: Armada Legacy
bx-commando-droids-boarding-team-old-leg.name: BX Commando Droids
bx-commando-droids-boarding-team-old-leg.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. Remove all command tokens, chaff tokens and focus tokens from that ship.
